summary: Phase 1 infrastructure partially complete. Helper lemmas for membership preservation added but require sorry for complex position-mismatch cases.

partial_progress.details: Added infrastructure lemmas (addToAllFamilies/FutureTimes/PastTimes_preserves_mem_getFormulas) and helper lemma addFormula_preserves_mem_diff_position. Key sorry: addFormula_preserves_mem_diff_position requires generalizing existing diff_fam/diff_time lemmas. Build succeeds with sorries.

completion_data.completion_summary: Phase 1 infrastructure for multi-formula seed builder partially implemented. Added preservation lemmas for addToAllFamilies, addToAllFutureTimes, addToAllPastTimes. Key blocker: addFormula_preserves_mem_diff_position requires extending existing lemmas to handle mismatched query/add positions.
